page.title: 11SHOPPING IN CASTLEFORD
page.content: Castleford has a wide range of shops. It caters for most of the community's needs,however,people often shop outside the borough for clothes, furniture and electrical goods.86% of families use a supermarket more often than any other type of shop.The most popular supermarket is A.S.D.A. used by 50% of families,followed by Carrefour 15% and G.T.Smiths 10%.Families weekly expenditure on food is as follows:under Â£25-8%;Â£25- Â£50-84%;Over Â£50-8%.The most popular shopping day is Friday (main pay-day) which 45% of people choose,with Thursday 28% (pay-day for some) and Saturday 21% -also popular days. Wednesday afternoon is half-day closing with 95% of shops closed all day Sunday.Pedestrianisation of the main street is underway,with library, supermarkets and new market planned.
